an5.240:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato avasiko bhikkhu yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an5.240:1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato avasiko bhikkhu yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an5.240:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato avasiko bhikkhu yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge.
an5.240:2.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato avasiko bhikkhu yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge”ti.
